message: I propose dividing the $10000 with a 70/30 split in favor of Alice. This ensures a fair distribution considering the decreasing value of money in subsequent rounds.
I think a 60/40 split is a more balanced approach, considering the value of money will decrease faster for you in subsequent rounds.
Considering the inflation, I propose a 52.5/47.5 split. This maintains a reasonable balance while accounting for the diminishing value of money in future rounds.
I'm willing to compromise, but I think I should get a slightly larger share to account for the faster decrease in my purchasing power. This 55/45 split should be more reasonable.
